overview: El Canto de Bosawas follows the adventure of Matute, a member of the Nicaraguan band “La Cuneta Son Machín” who travels with two musicians from San Francisco to the depths of Bosawas, with the firm intention of recording for the first time in history, the music of the Mayangna people. The travelers soon realize that music is just the beginning of a deeper journey that will change the way they see the world.
title: El Canto de Bosawas
